p: Regarding the circulation of RVA in canines and birds, the prevalence was 53% and 29%, respectively. Although in the Amazon region there are records of RVA, RVD, RVF and RVG that infect birds [ 57â€“ 58] and RVD in migratory birds [ 59], all were detected by RT-PCR assays differently from the present study which detected the RVA by RT-qPCR involving a variety of animal species.
